Chapter 2 About Us We are Team Keep Rolling, a group of MBAn students in the first-ever year of this new program! We chose this name to describe us because we went into this semester with the plan to never give up, continue to be creative and bring our ideas together for success! As individuals, we bring lots of different skills and perspectives to this collective team and are motivated to learn more about career paths for this new program to serve future students.
